item.title: Anki Project - English Speaking
item.description:
1단계: 보이는 대로 말하기 (Picture Description)

2단계: 일상 생활 말하기 (Daily Life)

3단계: 논리적으로 생각을 말하기 (Argumentative Speaking)

References

DET Practice. 2025. “60 Duolingo Photo Description Samples with High-Scoring Answers.” DET Practice: The best Duolingo English Test Practice platform. https://www.detpractice.com/60-duolingo-photo-desc.

Dhanani, Brijesh. 2022. “50+ Duolingo Picture Description Examples with Sample Answers For Practice.” Gurully. https://www.gurully.com/blog/tips-to-crack-duolingo-image-description-question/.

김태운. 2013. 시나공 OPIC. 길벗이지톡.

피유진. 2024. 나 혼자만 알고 싶은 영어책: 토플맛. 서사원.
